name: Soul Launcher
description:
Why should playing a game involve studying? Why not try a game where it's easier to grow? Enjoy the gameplay itself, without worrying about conquering or making alliances!

■■■■■Game Intro■■■■■

Meet a powerful exorcist! She leaves her quiet life and explores dungeons to complete her mission!

■■■■■Game Characteristics■■■■■

■No complicated growth system!
Why should playing a game involve studying? Introducing the simplest growth system!

■Meet and upgrade lots of characters!
Assemble a group of unique exorcists and grow stronger together!

■Riveting battle system!
Wipe out approaching enemies in one swoop!

■High-quality pixel graphics!
High-quality graphics that are comfortable on the eyes!

■Boss slayer!
Train a slayer to slaughter bosses!

Thank you for downloading Exorcist Defense.
A short review or brief feedback is a huge help to the developers.

Thank you!
